features: A Gateway to Wondrous Adventures: Our adorable baby dolls will send your little one on an enchanting adventure that sparks their imagination; From the soft vinyl head to dainty fingers and toes, La Baby doll toys transform everyday play into a world of discovery and wonder

They're a Perfect Fit for Petite Palms: At just 11 inches, this toddler baby doll is the perfect pint-sized companion, designed to be cuddled, carried, and cherished; Every toy baby doll is unscented and carefully created with an emphasis on safety – no buttons, zippers, eyelashes, or open-close eyelids

Resilient & Refreshable for Endless Play: Designed with love and child-friendly materials, the baby dolls for girls are soft to the touch yet sturdy enough to endure countless trips in the world of make-believe; Each newborn baby doll is washable and durable, perfect for kids 12 months and up

A Baby Doll for Every Little Darling: From Caucasian to African American, Asian to Hispanic, and even a delightful Caucasian twin set, we've created a La Baby to reflect the wonderful diversity of our world; Each baby doll for 1 year old arrives lovingly dressed in a removable outfit, paired with charming accessories

La Baby Is Approved by the NPC: With the stamp of approval from the National Parenting Center, La Baby stands as a testament to our commitment to quality and safety; This isn't just a toy doll, it's a trusted companion for your child, recognized by those who understand what truly matters when it comes to nurturing the parent-child bond
Made by JC TOYS. A USA based family owned and operated award-winning baby doll designer and manufacturer with over 30 years experience creating real-life baby dolls and accessories
body.description: Welcome to a world where playtime becomes magical, where everyday moments transform into extraordinary adventures. Our charming dolls are designed to kindle the flame of your child's imagination, taking them on enchanting journeys of make-believe and discovery. From the tender touch of the soft vinyl head, to the delicate grasp of tiny fingers and toes, La Baby isn't just a doll - it's a gateway to a realm of wonder. Crafted with care and a keen eye for safety, each 11” doll is unscented and designed devoid of any buttons, zippers, or fiddly bits because we believe that peace of mind should never be compromised during precious playtimes. Each doll is crafted with affection in Spain, using materials that are gentle on young skin and yet robust enough to weather countless escapades in imaginary lands. They’re designed to be an enduring companion throughout your child's earliest adventures while helping to: · Bolster emotional growth · Inspire understanding and compassion · Nurture a sense of responsibility · Amplify creative expression · Ignite the power of imagination · Refine fine motor skills · Invigorate conversational abilities · Foster social interactions · Encourage a spirit of nurturing Our La Baby collection celebrates the beautiful diversity of our world, with dolls representing Caucasian, African American, Asian, and Hispanic ethnicities. Every doll arrives outfitted in a removable ensemble, accompanied by delightful accessories that add that extra sprinkle of charm to your child's playtime. But La Baby is more than just a playmate. With the prestigious National Parenting Center seal of approval, our dolls stand as symbols of our unwavering commitment to quality, safety, and the invaluable joy of children. Let La Baby become a cherished part of your child's world, because every childhood deserves a touch of magic.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Inspiring Imagination with Every Play Imagine a world where your child's creativity knows no bounds, fueled by a trusty, tiny companion. Our soft baby dolls are not just toys but partners in the grand adventures of your child's growing imagination. With every hug and every pretend play, watch as your little one's world of creativity expands and shines. Sized Just Right for Sweet Embraces Meet La Baby, the perfect pint-sized companion designed to fit snugly in your little one's hands. Lightweight and just 11 inches, she's the ideal size for children to hold, carry, and envelop in the warmest of cuddles. But don't let her small size fool you - she's big on bringing joy, comfort, and love to your child's world. Because Easy Care Means More Fun Our dolls are not only sweet and cuddly, but they're also a breeze to care for. Each doll is unscented and washable, meaning playtime can get as adventurous as your child's imagination allows. So let's embrace those messy playdates, knowing La Baby is just a gentle wash away from being good as new. Creating Joy for Kids & Parents Alike At our heart, we're more than a toy brand. We're the architects of joy, crafting not just dolls but delightful moments that light up the faces of children and their parents. We're dedicated to infusing a sense of wonder, a dash of comfort, and an abundance of smiles into homes across the globe.

Baby Dolls as Diverse as Our World In our beautiful world of diversity, we believe every child should see a reflection of themselves in the toys they play with. That's why La Baby dolls come in a rainbow of ethnicities - Caucasian, African American, Asian, and Hispanic. These dolls are more than just playthings; they're a celebration of our wonderfully varied world. Extras That Excite at Every Playdate Every one of our baby dolls comes fashionably ready for fun, dressed in a delightful, removable outfit complete with a matching hat and cozy blanket. But that's not all – each set also includes a cute little pacifier, adding an extra touch of realism and charm to your child's playtime. Designed in Spain & Loved Worldwide Each JC Toys La Baby doll is a tiny masterpiece. With a soft vinyl head, arms, and legs, these dolls boast the most charming details - bright, sparkling eyes that invite endless play, smooth baby cheeks perfect for gentle touches, delicate fingers and toes, and the sweetest wispy hair. At JC Toys Your Peace of Mind Is Our Priority La Baby, carrying the esteemed National Parenting Center's Seal of Approval, isn't just a toy; it promises quality, safety, and hours of joy. Each doll is thoughtfully designed, with the pacifier cleverly attached to the outfit for seamless play. Prioritizing safety, you won't find buttons, zippers, eyelashes, or open-close eyelids on La Baby. Like all our dolls, La Baby is proudly BPA and phthalate-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This doll is well made with a sweet expression, soft body that is cuddly, and the perfect size for a toddler. I wrap her in a flannel blanket and pack her in OCC Shoeboxes gift. Highest recommendation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doll Delight: Perfect Pal for Your Little One's Adventures!
reviews.reviewText: Rating: 5/5 - A Kid's Dream Come True! 🌟👧Cute Companion: A Friend to Love! 🌈👭This doll is pure cuteness overload! With its adorable features and sweet expression, it's an instant BFF for your little one. Get ready for non-stop giggles and heartwarming moments as they embark on imaginative journeys together.Real-Like Wonder: A Playtime Marvel! 👧💖Prepare for amazement! This doll's lifelike appearance is like having a tiny playmate straight from fairy tales. Your child will be captivated by the realistic details, creating a magical bond that brings their imaginative adventures to life.Cleanup Made Easy: Mom's Helper! 🧼✨No more worries about playtime messes! This doll is a breeze to clean, saving mom's day when spills happen. A quick wipe, and it's ready for the next round of play – making it a practical choice for moms who appreciate both fun and convenience.Built for Fun: Playtime Durability! 🛠️🌟Say hello to a doll that can keep up with endless playtime escapades! Built to withstand the energetic love of a child, this doll ensures countless hours of joy, standing strong through tea parties, pretend picnics, and imaginative journeys.Affordable Joy: Big Smiles, Small Price! 💸🎁And the best part? This delightful doll won't break the piggy bank. The price is a parent's dream, proving that you can gift your child a high-quality, lifelike playmate without sacrificing your budget.Final Verdict: A Kid's Best Playtime Buddy! 💕🎉From its irresistible cuteness to lifelike charm, easy cleanup, durability, and budget-friendly price, this doll is the ultimate playtime companion for your little one. It's not just a doll; it's a source of endless joy and a perfect partner in crime for all their adventures. 👧🌈

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweet baby doll
reviews.reviewText: 3 yr old was instantly “loving up” on this doll. Holds her. Feeds her. So sweet. Soft body is good for cuddling. Clothes can b removed and put back on easily. Blanket needs to b larger and pacifier is not good if child is giving up her own. Arrived on time. Just so pleased with this little doll. Price is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little size for babies and toddler!
reviews.reviewText: This baby doll is such a sweet size for littles to carry around! The baby doll is soft and seems to hold up really well. It comes with a pacifier accessory, however the only downside is that you can’t fit a toy bottle in its mouth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My 1 year old granddaughter is in love with her baby doll and won't part with her! Very soft doll and no small pieces to worry about. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So tiny and cute
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for our one and a half year-old granddaughter. She can hold them easily. They are adorable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this is the perfect size for a toddler
reviews.reviewText: family member is adopting a little girl from the congo and at her daycares there are only light skinned dolls and when I did foster care i remember that it's important to get africian american dolls to go along with all the other dolls as it helps kids relate better and the baby loves her doll.... takes it all over the house and watches tv and naps with it.... super cute too...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great doll for a toddler
reviews.reviewText: This small doll is well made. My toddler liked her so much I purchased several more varieties from this brand.
La muñeca es pequeña y muy bonita, de buena calidad, nos encanto

The box is very well made and high quality. It has a handle and it can be used as a small carrying box for the set. the doll is cute and cuddly. The bunny is ok. In general, it is a great option as a gift.
Not the best quality but good enough for the price. My son loves playing with it.
Pequeñita pero muy bonita. Perfecta para mí bebé de 16 meses.Además es blandita 🥰🥰🥰🥰
